entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Lachute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:59 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
